descriptionHTML:
I love PhotoSphere. So i want to spread PhotoSphere all over the world.

----------PhotoSphere mode----------
This watch face displays the PhotoSphere in the background.
It rotates slowly because it uses a small battery.
Moreover, you can change the background to your own PhotoSphere or Photo.
And you can customize camera's position.

----------TinyPlanet mode----------
This watch face can sync with Google Fit.
When you tilt it, watch face changes to Tiny planet mode.
This mode displays Step count and if your watch connects with your smartphone, your activity is displayed in the watch face.

----------How to take PhotoSphere----------
You can take it using Google Camera, Richo Theta, 360cam, PIXPRO SP360

----------Support Devices----------
I tested the devices below.
If this app does not work, please try reboot your Watch.
-Moto360
-LG G Watch
-LG G Watch R
-Samsung Gear Live

----------Using PhotoSphere and Samples----------
I use free great images to make this app and screen capture.

Vermont Beach Photosphere
https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/2.0/

comments: Fantasic!! Works on my Huawei watch perfectly.  Love changing to photos I took with a Ricoh Theta S.  Only thing thst would make this better is maybe some extra watch face styles. *hint hint*
recentChanges: Now, you can switch your watch face clock mode or fitness mode.
